description: This file provides structured logging utilities for the BackendAPI, including JSON-formatted log output, correlation ID management for request tracing, and logger configuration.

classes.name: JsonFormatter
classes.description: A custom logging formatter that outputs logs in JSON format, including timestamp, level, message, logger name, service, environment, correlation ID, extra fields, and exception info.

methods.name: get_logger
methods.description: Returns a structured logger instance configured for BackendAPI, ensuring root logger setup.

methods.name: set_correlation_id
methods.description: Sets the current request's correlation ID in the context, generating a new UUID if none is provided.

methods.name: get_correlation_id
methods.description: Retrieves the current correlation ID from the context, if set.

methods.name: clear_correlation_id
methods.description: Clears the correlation ID from the context, setting it to None.
